title: New Zealand Luxury Farm Stay near Cape Palliser with Daily Breakfast, Gourmet Dinner & Nightly Cocktails
description:
Perched on the edge of Palliser Bay, this grand Edwardian-style estate is a luxuriously secluded world of its own, stretching across 3,000 acres of rolling pasture, shimmering lakes and untouched coastline. Set between the Pacific Ocean and a working farm dotted with sheep, step into a sanctuary of timeless elegance in a bespoke suite with views of the sea to escape from daily life.

The main lodge, a fusion of rustic charm and French-inspired opulence, invites guests to indulge in the ritual of cocktail hour with free-flowing drinks and canapes, then linger in the dining room over candlelit four-course dinners with farm-to-table cuisine inspired by the estate's fertile lands.

Beyond the lodge's gilded interiors, days unfold at your own pace, with a number of curated experiences on offer to enrich your stay. Let life move slowly and unwind with a treatment at Hauora Spa, lounge by the indoor pool, explore the wine cellar with a guided tasting or sip in the skies on a helicopter wine flight. 

When adventure beckons, pedal your way through nearby vineyards, star gaze with a local astronomer, tour the working farm, challenge yourself with a spot of archery or take in the landscape on a thrilling quad bike tour.
offer_address: 4132 Wharekauhau Road Palliser Bay, RD3, Featherston 5773 New Zealand
